title: change toolbar text sizing
content: like everyone else I need to enlarge the toolbar and menu settings,, currently way too small. They were much larger but have somehow became smaller again. Cannot find a decent add on for this. There are a few around but dont work properly Thanks in advance.. Ps I dont need instructions re my computer it is merely the Firefox tool bar and search area

title: Firefox blocking Netzero emails
content:
I've used Firefox for several years without any problems however last week Firefox started blocking my Netzero emails and gives me the following message every time: 

  Blocked by Avira NetProtection   Detection name: HTML/ExpKit.Gen2   Url: webmail.netzero.net/?cf=sp   File size: 630   Content type: text/html   Calling process id: 12144   Calling process path: C:\Program Files (x86)\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe

I've tried unblocking popups and that has not worked. I do not have "avira net protection" installed on my computer. The same problem exists with Google Chrome but DuckDuckGo connects to my email OK. If you reply directly please reply to [edited from public] @netzero.com not the gmail address.
creator: delmassom

title: Re no longer trust Mozilla, ever again
content: After your recent suicidal change in terms of service, I decided that no matter how quickly you might back pedal, it doesn't matter ... I cannot trust any software you ever develop ever again under this or any other name ... goodbye, sorry you became such a bunch of psychos this had to happen, because you did make good software once upon a time, goodbye.
creator: galacticpresident
